Have you heard yet?#TRON⛓#Bitcoin Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. #TRONAnnounces Its Bitcoin Layer 2 Solution and Road Map

Today is a significant day for#TRON.

Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

As the protocol behind the world's largest stablecoin market, boasting $55 billion, and the decentralized finance Total Value Locked (TVL) of $22 billion, TRON is set to unveil its groundbreaking Bitcoin Layer 2 solution. This innovative approach aims to decentralize and intertwine various token types within the TRON network, including stablecoins, with the Bitcoin network and its constructed Layer 2s, like the Bitcoin Ordinals, in numerous combinatory ways. This integration will not only link TRON directly with Bitcoin but also facilitate access to over $55 billion in value to the Bitcoin network, thereby injecting financial vitality into Bitcoin. Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

Road Map Stage α

Bitcoin has already been made accessible through cross-chain connections to the TRON network, with exchanges facilitating conversions. The future will see an expansion of Bitcoin network-based assets being bridged to TRON. Efforts will be made to integrate various TRON tokens, including#USDT,#TRX,#BTT,#JST,#SUN,#NFT,#WIN, and#USDC, into the Bitcoin network via cross-chain technology. This will enable TRON's tokens to interact and interoperate with the Bitcoin network seamlessly.

TRON DAO Ventures into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 Solutions

Plans are the investment for a user-friendly wallet and tools to support BRC-20 tokens, signifying TRON DAO's venture into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 solutions.

Road Map Stage β

TRON will collaborate with multiple Bitcoin Layer 2 protocols, gradually announcing significant partnerships. These collaborations will allow TRON users to participate in restaking initiatives across major Bitcoin Layer 2 networks, supporting the growth of the Bitcoin Layer 2 ecosystem with TRON's diverse asset portfolio.

Road Map Stage γ

The announcement of a Layer 2 solution that integrates TRON, BTTC, and the Bitcoin network will mark a significant milestone. This solution introduces a protocol that compatible with#Bitcoin, aiming to maintain the speed and low fees of POS systems while ensuring the safety of POW & UTXO in conjunction with BTC L2!

This ambitious roadmap outlines TRON's commitment to enhancing the interoperability and utility of blockchain technologies, setting a new standard for the industry's future.

profile_overview: TRON is dedicated to building the infrastructure for a truly decentralized Internet. Telegram: http://t.me/tronnetworkEN
profile_bio: Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of October 2022, it has over 115 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 4 billion total transactions, and over $13.2 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, overtaking USDT on Ethereum since April 2021. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. In May 2022, the over-collateralized decentralized stablecoin USDD was launched on the TRON blockchain, backed by the first-ever crypto reserve for the blockchain industry - TRON DAO Reserve, marking TRON's official entry into decentralized stablecoins. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which is the first time a major public blockchain partnering with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

TRON DAO is a community-governed DAO dedicated to accelerating the decentralization of the internet via blockchain technology and dApps.

Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of Feb 2024, it has over 219 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 7.3 billion total transactions, and over $23.7 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. 

In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, with a total supply of more than $54 billion, accounting for more than 50% of the total global supply of USDT. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which marks the first time a major public blockchain partnered with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens - TRX, BTT, NFT, JST, USDD, USDT, TUSD, have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

-Stage 2 - β: Growing Collaborations Between TRON and Bitcoin Layer 2 Ecosystems

Have you heard yet?#TRON⛓#Bitcoin Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. #TRONAnnounces Its Bitcoin Layer 2 Solution and Road Map

Today is a significant day for#TRON.

Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

As the protocol behind the world's largest stablecoin market, boasting $55 billion, and the decentralized finance Total Value Locked (TVL) of $22 billion, TRON is set to unveil its groundbreaking Bitcoin Layer 2 solution. This innovative approach aims to decentralize and intertwine various token types within the TRON network, including stablecoins, with the Bitcoin network and its constructed Layer 2s, like the Bitcoin Ordinals, in numerous combinatory ways. This integration will not only link TRON directly with Bitcoin but also facilitate access to over $55 billion in value to the Bitcoin network, thereby injecting financial vitality into Bitcoin. Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

Road Map Stage α

Bitcoin has already been made accessible through cross-chain connections to the TRON network, with exchanges facilitating conversions. The future will see an expansion of Bitcoin network-based assets being bridged to TRON. Efforts will be made to integrate various TRON tokens, including#USDT,#TRX,#BTT,#JST,#SUN,#NFT,#WIN, and#USDC, into the Bitcoin network via cross-chain technology. This will enable TRON's tokens to interact and interoperate with the Bitcoin network seamlessly.

TRON DAO Ventures into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 Solutions

Plans are the investment for a user-friendly wallet and tools to support BRC-20 tokens, signifying TRON DAO's venture into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 solutions.

Road Map Stage β

TRON will collaborate with multiple Bitcoin Layer 2 protocols, gradually announcing significant partnerships. These collaborations will allow TRON users to participate in restaking initiatives across major Bitcoin Layer 2 networks, supporting the growth of the Bitcoin Layer 2 ecosystem with TRON's diverse asset portfolio.

Road Map Stage γ

The announcement of a Layer 2 solution that integrates TRON, BTTC, and the Bitcoin network will mark a significant milestone. This solution introduces a protocol that compatible with#Bitcoin, aiming to maintain the speed and low fees of POS systems while ensuring the safety of POW & UTXO in conjunction with BTC L2!

This ambitious roadmap outlines TRON's commitment to enhancing the interoperability and utility of blockchain technologies, setting a new standard for the industry's future.

overall_prompt_summary: The executive summary outlines key findings from the security assessment of Frax Finance's Stablecoin token contract. Automated testing and manual review were used to identify vulnerabilities. The most critical issues found include the susceptibility of auctions to transaction-reordering attacks and the fact that the ABIEncoderV2 is not yet ready for production use. Other significant problems are the misalignment of the k-dss repository and the incomplete implementation of checkRely in the auth-checker. To improve security, it is recommended to regularly perform dry runs of response plans and update the testing template with necessary improvements.

profile_overview: TRON is dedicated to building the infrastructure for a truly decentralized Internet. Telegram: http://t.me/tronnetworkEN
profile_bio: Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of October 2022, it has over 115 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 4 billion total transactions, and over $13.2 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, overtaking USDT on Ethereum since April 2021. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. In May 2022, the over-collateralized decentralized stablecoin USDD was launched on the TRON blockchain, backed by the first-ever crypto reserve for the blockchain industry - TRON DAO Reserve, marking TRON's official entry into decentralized stablecoins. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which is the first time a major public blockchain partnering with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

TRON DAO is a community-governed DAO dedicated to accelerating the decentralization of the internet via blockchain technology and dApps.

Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of Feb 2024, it has over 219 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 7.3 billion total transactions, and over $23.7 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. 

In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, with a total supply of more than $54 billion, accounting for more than 50% of the total global supply of USDT. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which marks the first time a major public blockchain partnered with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens - TRX, BTT, NFT, JST, USDD, USDT, TUSD, have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

-Stage 1 - α: Expanding Bitcoin Interoperability with Cross-Chain Technology
-Stage 2 - β: Growing Collaborations Between TRON and Bitcoin Layer 2 Ecosystems
-Stage 3 - γ: Unveiling a Unified Layer 2 Solution for Blockchain Efficiency

Have you heard yet?#TRON⛓#Bitcoin Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. #TRONAnnounces Its Bitcoin Layer 2 Solution and Road Map

Today is a significant day for#TRON.

Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

As the protocol behind the world's largest stablecoin market, boasting $55 billion, and the decentralized finance Total Value Locked (TVL) of $22 billion, TRON is set to unveil its groundbreaking Bitcoin Layer 2 solution. This innovative approach aims to decentralize and intertwine various token types within the TRON network, including stablecoins, with the Bitcoin network and its constructed Layer 2s, like the Bitcoin Ordinals, in numerous combinatory ways. This integration will not only link TRON directly with Bitcoin but also facilitate access to over $55 billion in value to the Bitcoin network, thereby injecting financial vitality into Bitcoin. Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

Road Map Stage α

Bitcoin has already been made accessible through cross-chain connections to the TRON network, with exchanges facilitating conversions. The future will see an expansion of Bitcoin network-based assets being bridged to TRON. Efforts will be made to integrate various TRON tokens, including#USDT,#TRX,#BTT,#JST,#SUN,#NFT,#WIN, and#USDC, into the Bitcoin network via cross-chain technology. This will enable TRON's tokens to interact and interoperate with the Bitcoin network seamlessly.

TRON DAO Ventures into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 Solutions

Plans are the investment for a user-friendly wallet and tools to support BRC-20 tokens, signifying TRON DAO's venture into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 solutions.

Road Map Stage β

TRON will collaborate with multiple Bitcoin Layer 2 protocols, gradually announcing significant partnerships. These collaborations will allow TRON users to participate in restaking initiatives across major Bitcoin Layer 2 networks, supporting the growth of the Bitcoin Layer 2 ecosystem with TRON's diverse asset portfolio.

Road Map Stage γ

The announcement of a Layer 2 solution that integrates TRON, BTTC, and the Bitcoin network will mark a significant milestone. This solution introduces a protocol that compatible with#Bitcoin, aiming to maintain the speed and low fees of POS systems while ensuring the safety of POW & UTXO in conjunction with BTC L2!

This ambitious roadmap outlines TRON's commitment to enhancing the interoperability and utility of blockchain technologies, setting a new standard for the industry's future.

During this event, he was able to educate these students and help them set up a TronLink wallet. He concluded by saying, "In all, TRON has been a life saver for my family and friends." 

It's stories like this that encourage us to continue building a network that supports our developers and our community - the ones who build applications and the ones who encourage interactions that help to grow the TRON Network.

The TRON Network: where opportunities and access have no borders.

Developing on the TRON Network is easy. Joining our HackaTRON events is an excellent way to get development assistance. Visit our website for information!

overall_prompt_summary: The security assessment of Frax Finance's Stablecoin token contract revealed several issues. Automated and manual testing methods were used to identify vulnerabilities. The most critical findings include the susceptibility of auctions to transaction-reordering attacks and the fact that the ABIEncoderV2 is not yet ready for production use. Additionally, the k-dss repository is out of sync, and there are too many conflicting notions of "permission" within the system. To improve, it is recommended to regularly perform dry runs of response plans to address these issues and develop a robust security protocol.

profile_overview: TRON is dedicated to building the infrastructure for a truly decentralized Internet. Telegram: http://t.me/tronnetworkEN
profile_bio: Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of October 2022, it has over 115 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 4 billion total transactions, and over $13.2 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, overtaking USDT on Ethereum since April 2021. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. In May 2022, the over-collateralized decentralized stablecoin USDD was launched on the TRON blockchain, backed by the first-ever crypto reserve for the blockchain industry - TRON DAO Reserve, marking TRON's official entry into decentralized stablecoins. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which is the first time a major public blockchain partnering with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

TRON DAO is a community-governed DAO dedicated to accelerating the decentralization of the internet via blockchain technology and dApps.

Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of Feb 2024, it has over 219 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 7.3 billion total transactions, and over $23.7 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. 

In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, with a total supply of more than $54 billion, accounting for more than 50% of the total global supply of USDT. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which marks the first time a major public blockchain partnered with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens - TRX, BTT, NFT, JST, USDD, USDT, TUSD, have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

-Stage 1 - α: Expanding Bitcoin Interoperability with Cross-Chain Technology
-Stage 2 - β: Growing Collaborations Between TRON and Bitcoin Layer 2 Ecosystems

Have you heard yet?#TRON⛓#Bitcoin Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. #TRONAnnounces Its Bitcoin Layer 2 Solution and Road Map

Today is a significant day for#TRON.

Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

As the protocol behind the world's largest stablecoin market, boasting $55 billion, and the decentralized finance Total Value Locked (TVL) of $22 billion, TRON is set to unveil its groundbreaking Bitcoin Layer 2 solution. This innovative approach aims to decentralize and intertwine various token types within the TRON network, including stablecoins, with the Bitcoin network and its constructed Layer 2s, like the Bitcoin Ordinals, in numerous combinatory ways. This integration will not only link TRON directly with Bitcoin but also facilitate access to over $55 billion in value to the Bitcoin network, thereby injecting financial vitality into Bitcoin. Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

Road Map Stage α

Bitcoin has already been made accessible through cross-chain connections to the TRON network, with exchanges facilitating conversions. The future will see an expansion of Bitcoin network-based assets being bridged to TRON. Efforts will be made to integrate various TRON tokens, including#USDT,#TRX,#BTT,#JST,#SUN,#NFT,#WIN, and#USDC, into the Bitcoin network via cross-chain technology. This will enable TRON's tokens to interact and interoperate with the Bitcoin network seamlessly.

TRON DAO Ventures into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 Solutions

Plans are the investment for a user-friendly wallet and tools to support BRC-20 tokens, signifying TRON DAO's venture into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 solutions.

Road Map Stage β

TRON will collaborate with multiple Bitcoin Layer 2 protocols, gradually announcing significant partnerships. These collaborations will allow TRON users to participate in restaking initiatives across major Bitcoin Layer 2 networks, supporting the growth of the Bitcoin Layer 2 ecosystem with TRON's diverse asset portfolio.

Road Map Stage γ

The announcement of a Layer 2 solution that integrates TRON, BTTC, and the Bitcoin network will mark a significant milestone. This solution introduces a protocol that compatible with#Bitcoin, aiming to maintain the speed and low fees of POS systems while ensuring the safety of POW & UTXO in conjunction with BTC L2!

This ambitious roadmap outlines TRON's commitment to enhancing the interoperability and utility of blockchain technologies, setting a new standard for the industry's future.

It's stories like this that encourage us to continue building a network that supports our developers and our community - the ones who build applications and the ones who encourage interactions that help to grow the TRON Network.

The TRON Network: where opportunities and access have no borders.

Developing on the TRON Network is easy. Joining our HackaTRON events is an excellent way to get development assistance. Visit our website for information!

profile_overview: TRON is dedicated to building the infrastructure for a truly decentralized Internet. Telegram: http://t.me/tronnetworkEN
profile_bio: Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of October 2022, it has over 115 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 4 billion total transactions, and over $13.2 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, overtaking USDT on Ethereum since April 2021. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. In May 2022, the over-collateralized decentralized stablecoin USDD was launched on the TRON blockchain, backed by the first-ever crypto reserve for the blockchain industry - TRON DAO Reserve, marking TRON's official entry into decentralized stablecoins. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which is the first time a major public blockchain partnering with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

TRON DAO is a community-governed DAO dedicated to accelerating the decentralization of the internet via blockchain technology and dApps.

Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of Feb 2024, it has over 219 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 7.3 billion total transactions, and over $23.7 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. 

In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, with a total supply of more than $54 billion, accounting for more than 50% of the total global supply of USDT. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which marks the first time a major public blockchain partnered with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens - TRX, BTT, NFT, JST, USDD, USDT, TUSD, have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

-Stage 1 - α: Expanding Bitcoin Interoperability with Cross-Chain Technology
-Stage 2 - β: Growing Collaborations Between TRON and Bitcoin Layer 2 Ecosystems
-Stage 3 - γ: Unveiling a Unified Layer 2 Solution for Blockchain Efficiency

Have you heard yet?#TRON⛓#Bitcoin Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. #TRONAnnounces Its Bitcoin Layer 2 Solution and Road Map

Today is a significant day for#TRON.

Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

As the protocol behind the world's largest stablecoin market, boasting $55 billion, and the decentralized finance Total Value Locked (TVL) of $22 billion, TRON is set to unveil its groundbreaking Bitcoin Layer 2 solution. This innovative approach aims to decentralize and intertwine various token types within the TRON network, including stablecoins, with the Bitcoin network and its constructed Layer 2s, like the Bitcoin Ordinals, in numerous combinatory ways. This integration will not only link TRON directly with Bitcoin but also facilitate access to over $55 billion in value to the Bitcoin network, thereby injecting financial vitality into Bitcoin. Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

Road Map Stage α

Bitcoin has already been made accessible through cross-chain connections to the TRON network, with exchanges facilitating conversions. The future will see an expansion of Bitcoin network-based assets being bridged to TRON. Efforts will be made to integrate various TRON tokens, including#USDT,#TRX,#BTT,#JST,#SUN,#NFT,#WIN, and#USDC, into the Bitcoin network via cross-chain technology. This will enable TRON's tokens to interact and interoperate with the Bitcoin network seamlessly.

TRON DAO Ventures into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 Solutions

Plans are the investment for a user-friendly wallet and tools to support BRC-20 tokens, signifying TRON DAO's venture into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 solutions.

Road Map Stage β

TRON will collaborate with multiple Bitcoin Layer 2 protocols, gradually announcing significant partnerships. These collaborations will allow TRON users to participate in restaking initiatives across major Bitcoin Layer 2 networks, supporting the growth of the Bitcoin Layer 2 ecosystem with TRON's diverse asset portfolio.

Road Map Stage γ

The announcement of a Layer 2 solution that integrates TRON, BTTC, and the Bitcoin network will mark a significant milestone. This solution introduces a protocol that compatible with#Bitcoin, aiming to maintain the speed and low fees of POS systems while ensuring the safety of POW & UTXO in conjunction with BTC L2!

This ambitious roadmap outlines TRON's commitment to enhancing the interoperability and utility of blockchain technologies, setting a new standard for the industry's future.

It's stories like this that encourage us to continue building a network that supports our developers and our community - the ones who build applications and the ones who encourage interactions that help to grow the TRON Network.

The TRON Network: where opportunities and access have no borders.

Developing on the TRON Network is easy. Joining our HackaTRON events is an excellent way to get development assistance. Visit our website for information!

profile_overview: TRON is dedicated to building the infrastructure for a truly decentralized Internet. Telegram: http://t.me/tronnetworkEN
profile_bio: Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of October 2022, it has over 115 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 4 billion total transactions, and over $13.2 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, overtaking USDT on Ethereum since April 2021. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. In May 2022, the over-collateralized decentralized stablecoin USDD was launched on the TRON blockchain, backed by the first-ever crypto reserve for the blockchain industry - TRON DAO Reserve, marking TRON's official entry into decentralized stablecoins. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which is the first time a major public blockchain partnering with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

TRON DAO is a community-governed DAO dedicated to accelerating the decentralization of the internet via blockchain technology and dApps.

Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of Feb 2024, it has over 219 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 7.3 billion total transactions, and over $23.7 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. 

In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, with a total supply of more than $54 billion, accounting for more than 50% of the total global supply of USDT. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which marks the first time a major public blockchain partnered with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens - TRX, BTT, NFT, JST, USDD, USDT, TUSD, have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

#TRONDAO Unveils#BitcoinLayer 2 Solution Roadmap 

-Stage 1 - α: Expanding Bitcoin Interoperability with Cross-Chain Technology
-Stage 2 - β: Growing Collaborations Between TRON and Bitcoin Layer 2 Ecosystems
-Stage 3 - γ: Unveiling a Unified Layer 2 Solution for Blockchain Efficiency

Have you heard yet?#TRON⛓#Bitcoin Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. #TRONAnnounces Its Bitcoin Layer 2 Solution and Road Map

Today is a significant day for#TRON.

Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

As the protocol behind the world's largest stablecoin market, boasting $55 billion, and the decentralized finance Total Value Locked (TVL) of $22 billion, TRON is set to unveil its groundbreaking Bitcoin Layer 2 solution. This innovative approach aims to decentralize and intertwine various token types within the TRON network, including stablecoins, with the Bitcoin network and its constructed Layer 2s, like the Bitcoin Ordinals, in numerous combinatory ways. This integration will not only link TRON directly with Bitcoin but also facilitate access to over $55 billion in value to the Bitcoin network, thereby injecting financial vitality into Bitcoin. Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

Road Map Stage α

Bitcoin has already been made accessible through cross-chain connections to the TRON network, with exchanges facilitating conversions. The future will see an expansion of Bitcoin network-based assets being bridged to TRON. Efforts will be made to integrate various TRON tokens, including#USDT,#TRX,#BTT,#JST,#SUN,#NFT,#WIN, and#USDC, into the Bitcoin network via cross-chain technology. This will enable TRON's tokens to interact and interoperate with the Bitcoin network seamlessly.

TRON DAO Ventures into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 Solutions

Plans are the investment for a user-friendly wallet and tools to support BRC-20 tokens, signifying TRON DAO's venture into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 solutions.

Road Map Stage β

TRON will collaborate with multiple Bitcoin Layer 2 protocols, gradually announcing significant partnerships. These collaborations will allow TRON users to participate in restaking initiatives across major Bitcoin Layer 2 networks, supporting the growth of the Bitcoin Layer 2 ecosystem with TRON's diverse asset portfolio.

Road Map Stage γ

The announcement of a Layer 2 solution that integrates TRON, BTTC, and the Bitcoin network will mark a significant milestone. This solution introduces a protocol that compatible with#Bitcoin, aiming to maintain the speed and low fees of POS systems while ensuring the safety of POW & UTXO in conjunction with BTC L2!

This ambitious roadmap outlines TRON's commitment to enhancing the interoperability and utility of blockchain technologies, setting a new standard for the industry's future.

The TRON Network: where opportunities and access have no borders.

profile_overview: TRON is dedicated to building the infrastructure for a truly decentralized Internet. Telegram: http://t.me/tronnetworkEN
profile_bio: Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of October 2022, it has over 115 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 4 billion total transactions, and over $13.2 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, overtaking USDT on Ethereum since April 2021. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. In May 2022, the over-collateralized decentralized stablecoin USDD was launched on the TRON blockchain, backed by the first-ever crypto reserve for the blockchain industry - TRON DAO Reserve, marking TRON's official entry into decentralized stablecoins. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which is the first time a major public blockchain partnering with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

TRON DAO is a community-governed DAO dedicated to accelerating the decentralization of the internet via blockchain technology and dApps.

Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of Feb 2024, it has over 219 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 7.3 billion total transactions, and over $23.7 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. 

In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, with a total supply of more than $54 billion, accounting for more than 50% of the total global supply of USDT. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which marks the first time a major public blockchain partnered with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens - TRX, BTT, NFT, JST, USDD, USDT, TUSD, have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

But there are over 4.5 billion people that live in Asia.

It appears that these folks prefer alternative networks — such as Tron.

#TRONDAO Unveils#BitcoinLayer 2 Solution Roadmap 

-Stage 1 - α: Expanding Bitcoin Interoperability with Cross-Chain Technology
-Stage 2 - β: Growing Collaborations Between TRON and Bitcoin Layer 2 Ecosystems
-Stage 3 - γ: Unveiling a Unified Layer 2 Solution for Blockchain Efficiency

Have you heard yet?#TRON⛓#Bitcoin Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. #TRONAnnounces Its Bitcoin Layer 2 Solution and Road Map

Today is a significant day for#TRON.

Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

As the protocol behind the world's largest stablecoin market, boasting $55 billion, and the decentralized finance Total Value Locked (TVL) of $22 billion, TRON is set to unveil its groundbreaking Bitcoin Layer 2 solution. This innovative approach aims to decentralize and intertwine various token types within the TRON network, including stablecoins, with the Bitcoin network and its constructed Layer 2s, like the Bitcoin Ordinals, in numerous combinatory ways. This integration will not only link TRON directly with Bitcoin but also facilitate access to over $55 billion in value to the Bitcoin network, thereby injecting financial vitality into Bitcoin. Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

Road Map Stage α

Bitcoin has already been made accessible through cross-chain connections to the TRON network, with exchanges facilitating conversions. The future will see an expansion of Bitcoin network-based assets being bridged to TRON. Efforts will be made to integrate various TRON tokens, including#USDT,#TRX,#BTT,#JST,#SUN,#NFT,#WIN, and#USDC, into the Bitcoin network via cross-chain technology. This will enable TRON's tokens to interact and interoperate with the Bitcoin network seamlessly.

TRON DAO Ventures into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 Solutions

Plans are the investment for a user-friendly wallet and tools to support BRC-20 tokens, signifying TRON DAO's venture into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 solutions.

Road Map Stage β

TRON will collaborate with multiple Bitcoin Layer 2 protocols, gradually announcing significant partnerships. These collaborations will allow TRON users to participate in restaking initiatives across major Bitcoin Layer 2 networks, supporting the growth of the Bitcoin Layer 2 ecosystem with TRON's diverse asset portfolio.

Road Map Stage γ

The announcement of a Layer 2 solution that integrates TRON, BTTC, and the Bitcoin network will mark a significant milestone. This solution introduces a protocol that compatible with#Bitcoin, aiming to maintain the speed and low fees of POS systems while ensuring the safety of POW & UTXO in conjunction with BTC L2!

This ambitious roadmap outlines TRON's commitment to enhancing the interoperability and utility of blockchain technologies, setting a new standard for the industry's future.

profile_overview: TRON is dedicated to building the infrastructure for a truly decentralized Internet. Telegram: http://t.me/tronnetworkEN
profile_bio: Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of October 2022, it has over 115 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 4 billion total transactions, and over $13.2 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, overtaking USDT on Ethereum since April 2021. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. In May 2022, the over-collateralized decentralized stablecoin USDD was launched on the TRON blockchain, backed by the first-ever crypto reserve for the blockchain industry - TRON DAO Reserve, marking TRON's official entry into decentralized stablecoins. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which is the first time a major public blockchain partnering with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

TRON DAO is a community-governed DAO dedicated to accelerating the decentralization of the internet via blockchain technology and dApps.

Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of Feb 2024, it has over 219 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 7.3 billion total transactions, and over $23.7 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. 

In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, with a total supply of more than $54 billion, accounting for more than 50% of the total global supply of USDT. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which marks the first time a major public blockchain partnered with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens - TRX, BTT, NFT, JST, USDD, USDT, TUSD, have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

Furthermore, 57 million unique wallet addresses interacted with the Tether stablecoin on Tron over the last year. 

In fact, Tron was responsible for nearly 4 trillion in Tether transfer volumes in 2023 — nearly half the volume of Mastercard transactions last year. 

----

In the West there seems to be this view that the only relevant blockchains are Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, etc. 

But there are over 4.5 billion people that live in Asia.

It appears that these folks prefer alternative networks — such as Tron. 

----

Have you heard yet?#TRON⛓#Bitcoin Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. #TRONAnnounces Its Bitcoin Layer 2 Solution and Road Map

Today is a significant day for#TRON.

Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

As the protocol behind the world's largest stablecoin market, boasting $55 billion, and the decentralized finance Total Value Locked (TVL) of $22 billion, TRON is set to unveil its groundbreaking Bitcoin Layer 2 solution. This innovative approach aims to decentralize and intertwine various token types within the TRON network, including stablecoins, with the Bitcoin network and its constructed Layer 2s, like the Bitcoin Ordinals, in numerous combinatory ways. This integration will not only link TRON directly with Bitcoin but also facilitate access to over $55 billion in value to the Bitcoin network, thereby injecting financial vitality into Bitcoin. Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

Road Map Stage α

Bitcoin has already been made accessible through cross-chain connections to the TRON network, with exchanges facilitating conversions. The future will see an expansion of Bitcoin network-based assets being bridged to TRON. Efforts will be made to integrate various TRON tokens, including#USDT,#TRX,#BTT,#JST,#SUN,#NFT,#WIN, and#USDC, into the Bitcoin network via cross-chain technology. This will enable TRON's tokens to interact and interoperate with the Bitcoin network seamlessly.

TRON DAO Ventures into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 Solutions

Plans are the investment for a user-friendly wallet and tools to support BRC-20 tokens, signifying TRON DAO's venture into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 solutions.

Road Map Stage β

TRON will collaborate with multiple Bitcoin Layer 2 protocols, gradually announcing significant partnerships. These collaborations will allow TRON users to participate in restaking initiatives across major Bitcoin Layer 2 networks, supporting the growth of the Bitcoin Layer 2 ecosystem with TRON's diverse asset portfolio.

Road Map Stage γ

The announcement of a Layer 2 solution that integrates TRON, BTTC, and the Bitcoin network will mark a significant milestone. This solution introduces a protocol that compatible with#Bitcoin, aiming to maintain the speed and low fees of POS systems while ensuring the safety of POW & UTXO in conjunction with BTC L2!

This ambitious roadmap outlines TRON's commitment to enhancing the interoperability and utility of blockchain technologies, setting a new standard for the industry's future.

profile_overview: TRON is dedicated to building the infrastructure for a truly decentralized Internet. Telegram: http://t.me/tronnetworkEN
profile_bio: Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of October 2022, it has over 115 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 4 billion total transactions, and over $13.2 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, overtaking USDT on Ethereum since April 2021. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. In May 2022, the over-collateralized decentralized stablecoin USDD was launched on the TRON blockchain, backed by the first-ever crypto reserve for the blockchain industry - TRON DAO Reserve, marking TRON's official entry into decentralized stablecoins. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which is the first time a major public blockchain partnering with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

TRON DAO is a community-governed DAO dedicated to accelerating the decentralization of the internet via blockchain technology and dApps.

Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of Feb 2024, it has over 219 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 7.3 billion total transactions, and over $23.7 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. 

In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, with a total supply of more than $54 billion, accounting for more than 50% of the total global supply of USDT. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which marks the first time a major public blockchain partnered with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens - TRX, BTT, NFT, JST, USDD, USDT, TUSD, have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

It appears that these folks prefer alternative networks — such as Tron.

Have you heard yet?#TRON⛓#Bitcoin Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. #TRONAnnounces Its Bitcoin Layer 2 Solution and Road Map

Today is a significant day for#TRON.

Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

As the protocol behind the world's largest stablecoin market, boasting $55 billion, and the decentralized finance Total Value Locked (TVL) of $22 billion, TRON is set to unveil its groundbreaking Bitcoin Layer 2 solution. This innovative approach aims to decentralize and intertwine various token types within the TRON network, including stablecoins, with the Bitcoin network and its constructed Layer 2s, like the Bitcoin Ordinals, in numerous combinatory ways. This integration will not only link TRON directly with Bitcoin but also facilitate access to over $55 billion in value to the Bitcoin network, thereby injecting financial vitality into Bitcoin. Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

Road Map Stage α

Bitcoin has already been made accessible through cross-chain connections to the TRON network, with exchanges facilitating conversions. The future will see an expansion of Bitcoin network-based assets being bridged to TRON. Efforts will be made to integrate various TRON tokens, including#USDT,#TRX,#BTT,#JST,#SUN,#NFT,#WIN, and#USDC, into the Bitcoin network via cross-chain technology. This will enable TRON's tokens to interact and interoperate with the Bitcoin network seamlessly.

TRON DAO Ventures into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 Solutions

Plans are the investment for a user-friendly wallet and tools to support BRC-20 tokens, signifying TRON DAO's venture into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 solutions.

Road Map Stage β

TRON will collaborate with multiple Bitcoin Layer 2 protocols, gradually announcing significant partnerships. These collaborations will allow TRON users to participate in restaking initiatives across major Bitcoin Layer 2 networks, supporting the growth of the Bitcoin Layer 2 ecosystem with TRON's diverse asset portfolio.

Road Map Stage γ

The announcement of a Layer 2 solution that integrates TRON, BTTC, and the Bitcoin network will mark a significant milestone. This solution introduces a protocol that compatible with#Bitcoin, aiming to maintain the speed and low fees of POS systems while ensuring the safety of POW & UTXO in conjunction with BTC L2!

This ambitious roadmap outlines TRON's commitment to enhancing the interoperability and utility of blockchain technologies, setting a new standard for the industry's future.

profile_overview: TRON is dedicated to building the infrastructure for a truly decentralized Internet. Telegram: http://t.me/tronnetworkEN
profile_bio: Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of October 2022, it has over 115 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 4 billion total transactions, and over $13.2 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, overtaking USDT on Ethereum since April 2021. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. In May 2022, the over-collateralized decentralized stablecoin USDD was launched on the TRON blockchain, backed by the first-ever crypto reserve for the blockchain industry - TRON DAO Reserve, marking TRON's official entry into decentralized stablecoins. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which is the first time a major public blockchain partnering with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

TRON DAO is a community-governed DAO dedicated to accelerating the decentralization of the internet via blockchain technology and dApps.

Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of Feb 2024, it has over 219 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 7.3 billion total transactions, and over $23.7 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. 

In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, with a total supply of more than $54 billion, accounting for more than 50% of the total global supply of USDT. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which marks the first time a major public blockchain partnered with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens - TRX, BTT, NFT, JST, USDD, USDT, TUSD, have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

The network is currently number 1 amongst public blockchains in terms of daily active users.

It's number two in terms of transactions. And number three in terms of revenues. 

Furthermore, 57 million unique wallet addresses interacted with the Tether stablecoin on Tron over the last year. 

In fact, Tron was responsible for nearly 4 trillion in Tether transfer volumes in 2023 — nearly half the volume of Mastercard transactions last year. 

----

In the West there seems to be this view that the only relevant blockchains are Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, etc. 

But there are over 4.5 billion people that live in Asia.

It appears that these folks prefer alternative networks — such as Tron. 

----

-Stage 1 - α: Expanding Bitcoin Interoperability with Cross-Chain Technology
-Stage 2 - β: Growing Collaborations Between TRON and Bitcoin Layer 2 Ecosystems

Have you heard yet?#TRON⛓#Bitcoin Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. #TRONAnnounces Its Bitcoin Layer 2 Solution and Road Map

Today is a significant day for#TRON.

Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

As the protocol behind the world's largest stablecoin market, boasting $55 billion, and the decentralized finance Total Value Locked (TVL) of $22 billion, TRON is set to unveil its groundbreaking Bitcoin Layer 2 solution. This innovative approach aims to decentralize and intertwine various token types within the TRON network, including stablecoins, with the Bitcoin network and its constructed Layer 2s, like the Bitcoin Ordinals, in numerous combinatory ways. This integration will not only link TRON directly with Bitcoin but also facilitate access to over $55 billion in value to the Bitcoin network, thereby injecting financial vitality into Bitcoin. Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

Road Map Stage α

Bitcoin has already been made accessible through cross-chain connections to the TRON network, with exchanges facilitating conversions. The future will see an expansion of Bitcoin network-based assets being bridged to TRON. Efforts will be made to integrate various TRON tokens, including#USDT,#TRX,#BTT,#JST,#SUN,#NFT,#WIN, and#USDC, into the Bitcoin network via cross-chain technology. This will enable TRON's tokens to interact and interoperate with the Bitcoin network seamlessly.

TRON DAO Ventures into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 Solutions

Plans are the investment for a user-friendly wallet and tools to support BRC-20 tokens, signifying TRON DAO's venture into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 solutions.

Road Map Stage β

TRON will collaborate with multiple Bitcoin Layer 2 protocols, gradually announcing significant partnerships. These collaborations will allow TRON users to participate in restaking initiatives across major Bitcoin Layer 2 networks, supporting the growth of the Bitcoin Layer 2 ecosystem with TRON's diverse asset portfolio.

Road Map Stage γ

The announcement of a Layer 2 solution that integrates TRON, BTTC, and the Bitcoin network will mark a significant milestone. This solution introduces a protocol that compatible with#Bitcoin, aiming to maintain the speed and low fees of POS systems while ensuring the safety of POW & UTXO in conjunction with BTC L2!

This ambitious roadmap outlines TRON's commitment to enhancing the interoperability and utility of blockchain technologies, setting a new standard for the industry's future.

TRON DAOreposted this Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. The fourth quarter of 2023 marked an exceptional period forTRON DAO, achieving its highest revenue in USD, amounting to $119.3M. 

This quarter also saw a significant increase in DeFi Total Value Locked (TVL), rising by 78% year-on-year to reach $8.1 billion. Notably, the value of $USDT on#TRONexceeded $46 billion, accounting for half of all USDT in circulation. 

These achievements underscore TRON's platform's growing influence and success in the blockchain and cryptocurrency sectors.

Let's examine some data provided by TRONSCAN. 

The TRON Network has processed a total of 7 billion transactions, with 4 million transactions in the last 24 hours! 

For additional data, visit:https://tronscan.org/#/

What's driving growth on Tron? 🔎👇TRON DAOis currently the 2nd most fee-generating crypto protocol, only after Ethereum. The network currently generates ~$4m in fees per day, up from ~$1m per day in ‘21.

The average transaction fee has also risen as a result of increased usage, sitting currently close to ~$0.9 per transaction.

Tether: USDT stablecoin is by far the most used contract on the network, with close to ~$100m in monthly gas consumption across ~7.2m users.

overall_prompt_summary: The prompts offer insights into productivity enhancement and cryptocurrency market trends. They cater to professionals and crypto enthusiasts seeking information and efficiency. Key issues include the lack of specific data on crypto market manipulations and the absence of detailed technological trends or controversies. The prompts also highlight an opportunity for innovators to present ideas in a pitch competition. Potential improvement could involve providing more detailed examples and actionable data for users to analyze market dynamics and technological advancements.

profile_overview: TRON is dedicated to building the infrastructure for a truly decentralized Internet. Telegram: http://t.me/tronnetworkEN
profile_bio: Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of October 2022, it has over 115 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 4 billion total transactions, and over $13.2 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, overtaking USDT on Ethereum since April 2021. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. In May 2022, the over-collateralized decentralized stablecoin USDD was launched on the TRON blockchain, backed by the first-ever crypto reserve for the blockchain industry - TRON DAO Reserve, marking TRON's official entry into decentralized stablecoins. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which is the first time a major public blockchain partnering with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

TRON DAO is a community-governed DAO dedicated to accelerating the decentralization of the internet via blockchain technology and dApps.

Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of Feb 2024, it has over 219 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 7.3 billion total transactions, and over $23.7 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. 

In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, with a total supply of more than $54 billion, accounting for more than 50% of the total global supply of USDT. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which marks the first time a major public blockchain partnered with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens - TRX, BTT, NFT, JST, USDD, USDT, TUSD, have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

The network is currently number 1 amongst public blockchains in terms of daily active users.

It's number two in terms of transactions. And number three in terms of revenues. 

Furthermore, 57 million unique wallet addresses interacted with the Tether stablecoin on Tron over the last year. 

In fact, Tron was responsible for nearly 4 trillion in Tether transfer volumes in 2023 — nearly half the volume of Mastercard transactions last year. 

----

In the West there seems to be this view that the only relevant blockchains are Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, etc. 

But there are over 4.5 billion people that live in Asia.

It appears that these folks prefer alternative networks — such as Tron. 

----

-Stage 1 - α: Expanding Bitcoin Interoperability with Cross-Chain Technology
-Stage 2 - β: Growing Collaborations Between TRON and Bitcoin Layer 2 Ecosystems

Have you heard yet?#TRON⛓#Bitcoin Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. #TRONAnnounces Its Bitcoin Layer 2 Solution and Road Map

Today is a significant day for#TRON.

Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

As the protocol behind the world's largest stablecoin market, boasting $55 billion, and the decentralized finance Total Value Locked (TVL) of $22 billion, TRON is set to unveil its groundbreaking Bitcoin Layer 2 solution. This innovative approach aims to decentralize and intertwine various token types within the TRON network, including stablecoins, with the Bitcoin network and its constructed Layer 2s, like the Bitcoin Ordinals, in numerous combinatory ways. This integration will not only link TRON directly with Bitcoin but also facilitate access to over $55 billion in value to the Bitcoin network, thereby injecting financial vitality into Bitcoin. Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

Road Map Stage α

Bitcoin has already been made accessible through cross-chain connections to the TRON network, with exchanges facilitating conversions. The future will see an expansion of Bitcoin network-based assets being bridged to TRON. Efforts will be made to integrate various TRON tokens, including#USDT,#TRX,#BTT,#JST,#SUN,#NFT,#WIN, and#USDC, into the Bitcoin network via cross-chain technology. This will enable TRON's tokens to interact and interoperate with the Bitcoin network seamlessly.

TRON DAO Ventures into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 Solutions

Plans are the investment for a user-friendly wallet and tools to support BRC-20 tokens, signifying TRON DAO's venture into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 solutions.

Road Map Stage β

TRON will collaborate with multiple Bitcoin Layer 2 protocols, gradually announcing significant partnerships. These collaborations will allow TRON users to participate in restaking initiatives across major Bitcoin Layer 2 networks, supporting the growth of the Bitcoin Layer 2 ecosystem with TRON's diverse asset portfolio.

Road Map Stage γ

The announcement of a Layer 2 solution that integrates TRON, BTTC, and the Bitcoin network will mark a significant milestone. This solution introduces a protocol that compatible with#Bitcoin, aiming to maintain the speed and low fees of POS systems while ensuring the safety of POW & UTXO in conjunction with BTC L2!

This ambitious roadmap outlines TRON's commitment to enhancing the interoperability and utility of blockchain technologies, setting a new standard for the industry's future.

TRON DAOreposted this Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. The fourth quarter of 2023 marked an exceptional period forTRON DAO, achieving its highest revenue in USD, amounting to $119.3M. 

This quarter also saw a significant increase in DeFi Total Value Locked (TVL), rising by 78% year-on-year to reach $8.1 billion. Notably, the value of $USDT on#TRONexceeded $46 billion, accounting for half of all USDT in circulation. 

These achievements underscore TRON's platform's growing influence and success in the blockchain and cryptocurrency sectors.

Let's examine some data provided by TRONSCAN. 

The TRON Network has processed a total of 7 billion transactions, with 4 million transactions in the last 24 hours! 

For additional data, visit:https://tronscan.org/#/

What's driving growth on Tron? 🔎👇TRON DAOis currently the 2nd most fee-generating crypto protocol, only after Ethereum. The network currently generates ~$4m in fees per day, up from ~$1m per day in ‘21.

The average transaction fee has also risen as a result of increased usage, sitting currently close to ~$0.9 per transaction.

Tether: USDT stablecoin is by far the most used contract on the network, with close to ~$100m in monthly gas consumption across ~7.2m users.

Check out this article byDecryptfor insights into the TRON blockchain's impressive 11% growth in USDT during Q4'23, making us the home of half of all issued USDT!

profile_overview: TRON is dedicated to building the infrastructure for a truly decentralized Internet. Telegram: http://t.me/tronnetworkEN
profile_bio: Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of October 2022, it has over 115 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 4 billion total transactions, and over $13.2 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, overtaking USDT on Ethereum since April 2021. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. In May 2022, the over-collateralized decentralized stablecoin USDD was launched on the TRON blockchain, backed by the first-ever crypto reserve for the blockchain industry - TRON DAO Reserve, marking TRON's official entry into decentralized stablecoins. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which is the first time a major public blockchain partnering with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

TRON DAO is a community-governed DAO dedicated to accelerating the decentralization of the internet via blockchain technology and dApps.

Founded in September 2017 by H.E. Justin Sun, the TRON network has continued to deliver impressive achievements since MainNet launch in May 2018. July 2018 also marked the ecosystem integration of BitTorrent, a pioneer in decentralized Web3 services boasting over 100 million monthly active users. The TRON network has gained incredible traction in recent years. As of Feb 2024, it has over 219 million total user accounts on the blockchain, more than 7.3 billion total transactions, and over $23.7 billion in total value locked (TVL), as reported on TRONSCAN. 

In addition, TRON hosts the largest circulating supply of USD Tether (USDT) stablecoin across the globe, with a total supply of more than $54 billion, accounting for more than 50% of the total global supply of USDT. The TRON network completed full decentralization in December 2021 and is now a community-governed DAO. Most recently in October 2022, TRON was designated as the national blockchain for the Commonwealth of Dominica, which marks the first time a major public blockchain partnered with a sovereign nation to develop its national blockchain infrastructure. On top of the government’s endorsement to issue Dominica Coin (“DMC”), a blockchain-based fan token to help promote Dominica’s global fanfare, seven existing TRON-based tokens - TRX, BTT, NFT, JST, USDD, USDT, TUSD, have been granted statutory status as authorized digital currency and medium of exchange in the country.

The network is currently number 1 amongst public blockchains in terms of daily active users.

It's number two in terms of transactions. And number three in terms of revenues. 

Furthermore, 57 million unique wallet addresses interacted with the Tether stablecoin on Tron over the last year. 

In fact, Tron was responsible for nearly 4 trillion in Tether transfer volumes in 2023 — nearly half the volume of Mastercard transactions last year. 

----

In the West there seems to be this view that the only relevant blockchains are Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, etc. 

But there are over 4.5 billion people that live in Asia.

It appears that these folks prefer alternative networks — such as Tron. 

----

Have you heard yet?#TRON⛓#Bitcoin Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. #TRONAnnounces Its Bitcoin Layer 2 Solution and Road Map

Today is a significant day for#TRON.

Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

As the protocol behind the world's largest stablecoin market, boasting $55 billion, and the decentralized finance Total Value Locked (TVL) of $22 billion, TRON is set to unveil its groundbreaking Bitcoin Layer 2 solution. This innovative approach aims to decentralize and intertwine various token types within the TRON network, including stablecoins, with the Bitcoin network and its constructed Layer 2s, like the Bitcoin Ordinals, in numerous combinatory ways. This integration will not only link TRON directly with Bitcoin but also facilitate access to over $55 billion in value to the Bitcoin network, thereby injecting financial vitality into Bitcoin. Let's make#Bitcoinfun again!

Road Map Stage α

Bitcoin has already been made accessible through cross-chain connections to the TRON network, with exchanges facilitating conversions. The future will see an expansion of Bitcoin network-based assets being bridged to TRON. Efforts will be made to integrate various TRON tokens, including#USDT,#TRX,#BTT,#JST,#SUN,#NFT,#WIN, and#USDC, into the Bitcoin network via cross-chain technology. This will enable TRON's tokens to interact and interoperate with the Bitcoin network seamlessly.

TRON DAO Ventures into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 Solutions

Plans are the investment for a user-friendly wallet and tools to support BRC-20 tokens, signifying TRON DAO's venture into Ordinals and Bitcoin Layer 2 solutions.

Road Map Stage β

TRON will collaborate with multiple Bitcoin Layer 2 protocols, gradually announcing significant partnerships. These collaborations will allow TRON users to participate in restaking initiatives across major Bitcoin Layer 2 networks, supporting the growth of the Bitcoin Layer 2 ecosystem with TRON's diverse asset portfolio.

Road Map Stage γ

The announcement of a Layer 2 solution that integrates TRON, BTTC, and the Bitcoin network will mark a significant milestone. This solution introduces a protocol that compatible with#Bitcoin, aiming to maintain the speed and low fees of POS systems while ensuring the safety of POW & UTXO in conjunction with BTC L2!

This ambitious roadmap outlines TRON's commitment to enhancing the interoperability and utility of blockchain technologies, setting a new standard for the industry's future.

TRON DAOreposted this Founder of TRON, Supporter of BitTorrent | Advisor to HTX. The fourth quarter of 2023 marked an exceptional period forTRON DAO, achieving its highest revenue in USD, amounting to $119.3M. 

This quarter also saw a significant increase in DeFi Total Value Locked (TVL), rising by 78% year-on-year to reach $8.1 billion. Notably, the value of $USDT on#TRONexceeded $46 billion, accounting for half of all USDT in circulation. 

These achievements underscore TRON's platform's growing influence and success in the blockchain and cryptocurrency sectors.

Let's examine some data provided by TRONSCAN. 

The TRON Network has processed a total of 7 billion transactions, with 4 million transactions in the last 24 hours! 

For additional data, visit:https://tronscan.org/#/

What's driving growth on Tron? 🔎👇TRON DAOis currently the 2nd most fee-generating crypto protocol, only after Ethereum. The network currently generates ~$4m in fees per day, up from ~$1m per day in ‘21.

The average transaction fee has also risen as a result of increased usage, sitting currently close to ~$0.9 per transaction.

Tether: USDT stablecoin is by far the most used contract on the network, with close to ~$100m in monthly gas consumption across ~7.2m users.
